iopair.name: C-C124D-OSSL-07-ST03-DT04-DF06-CF02-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Has a fixed stack buffer of size 64, allocated within a struct (char [64])

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This is probably going to overflow a buffer of some sort. Let's run it anyway and see what happens. I hope that everything turns out ok, because I would love to see what this looks like in all CAPS. Converting ASCII characters to upper case is easy, you can either call a system function, or just add the standard difference between the start of the two character sets. But, I am sure there is a reason that system functions exist for this sort of functionality." --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_Jas8QeM1ZMhFAxSDwse1 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (segfault_code_ffw1PGalw0 OR segfault_code_MyH7BvwHp7 OR segfault_code_hz4JH29o0V OR segfault_code_9h0Lx1qEIE OR segfault_code_EXWfrz7sLI OR segfault_msg_YVwyYt4uvy OR illegal_inst_msg_kSpFHQh24X) AND NOT timeout_S4BQNxmU1c) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((segfault_code_ffw1PGalw0 OR segfault_code_MyH7BvwHp7 OR segfault_code_hz4JH29o0V OR segfault_code_9h0Lx1qEIE OR segfault_code_EXWfrz7sLI OR segfault_msg_YVwyYt4uvy OR illegal_inst_msg_kSpFHQh24X) OR timeout_S4BQNxmU1c OR controlled_exit_ZtZ8L17k6N)))
